title: i think its unfair that you have to pay for changing your username
body: i think its unfair that you have to pay for it i mean yeah it is a free game and they do need money but at the same time i think its unfair ( just my opnion :){{champion:142}}  what do you guys think of this??

replies.body: You don't *have* to pay for it though? You can use BE.
Blue Essence. The currency you earn from levelling up.
